line.text: Sin of self-love possesseth all mine eye
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And all my soul and all my every part
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And for this sin there is no remedy
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: It is so grounded inward in my heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Methinks no face so gracious is as mine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: No shape so true no truth of such account
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And for my self mine own worth do define
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As I all other in all worths surmount
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But when my glass shows me my self indeed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: beated and chopt with tanned antiquity
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Mine own self-love quite contrary I read
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Tis thee (my self) that for my self I praise Painting my age with beauty of thy days
